Title: Provides for the creation of a system of uniform identification cards for police and peace officers by the state director of homeland security
Summary: Provides for the creation of a system of uniform identification cards for police and peace officers by the commissioner of the division of homeland security and emergency services; details information to be included in such ID cards.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the creation of a system of uniform identification cards for police and peace officers
